thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com
thread.title: Mike Snay
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Mike Snay

author: Mike Snay
title: Mike Snay
text: I recently purchased a 6 month subscription with lucky tackle box. I was so excited that when I made my purchase I neglected to put in the FREELT promo to receive my live target lure free of charge. I reached out to customer service and without any hesitation Taylor contacted me back with a response telling me shipped out my live target lure free of charge. I spent months researching the various tackle companies out there. I chose LTB for obvious reasons. But it's the small things that can really make a company shine. So far I am more then satisfied with my choice and now I can hardly wait for the fun in the sun catching fish to begin. Keep up the good work LTB.
